name: Jeep Wrangler
description: The price of Jeep Wrangler, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 67.65  - 71.65 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with an engine of 1995 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Wrangler comes with 6 airbags. Jeep Wrangler has a ground clearance of 223 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 11 kmpl for Wrangler.

variants.variant_name: Wrangler Unlimited 1995 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 11.4 kmpl, 268 bhp
Wrangler Rubicon 1995 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 10.6 kmpl, 268 bhp
